en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors 7th Malaysia Nash Hash Run, Betong, Yala, South Thailand!
en.content:
REPORT BY FUSIONEXCEL DIRECTOR AND HASHER ANDREW LEONG.

Hash Chapter, Selama Batang Hash House Harrier is organizing the 7th Malaysia Nash Hash Run on the 
01st and 02nd May 2009 at Betong, Yala, Southern Thailand. FusionExcel is proud to be the Sponsor of this event. 

A press conference was held on 21st April 2009 at the Garden View Hotel which was attended by the 
Deputy Mayor of Betong, Mr. Chalermchai, the Tourism Authority of Thailand, Narathiwat Director 
Mr. Ahman Mad-adam, Police Chief of Betong Mr. Sombat Wangdee and Malaysia Hash Council Chairman 
Mr. Murugan.

During the event, the Deputy Mayor and the guests of honor were shown demonstration of the power of FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant by FusionExcel Director Andrew Leong and they were all amazed with the effects of the pendant. As the No. 2 man in Betong, Mr. Chalermchai suffers from stress and fatigue. He is very happy to wear FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant to improve his health and welcome us to visit him on our next trip to Betong. We hope by then, he has improved his health and actively promoting FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant to the people of Betong!
